snippet: The ruling endorsed the argument that air defense weapons in a residential area in London were necessary to ward off a terrorist strike.
abstract: High Court judge in London dismisses a suit brought by residents of a public housing complex that is to be used as a site for anti-aircraft defense weaponry during the London Olympic Games; residents feared that the missile battery would make them a potential target for terrorist attack; five similar batteries will be deployed across the city.
lead_paragraph: The ruling endorsed the argument that air defense weapons in a residential area in London were necessary to ward off a terrorist strike.

headline.seo: Judge Dismisses Londoners’ Suit Over Olympic Missiles
headline.main: Judge Dismisses Suit by Londoners Wary of Olympic Air Defenses on Their Roof
headline.print_headline: Judge Dismisses Suit by Londoners Wary of Olympic Air Defenses on Their Roof
